branchCategory.name: AK1500, Single Stage Regulator for General Applications, Low Flow (Tied-diaphragm)
branchCategory.description: Series AK regulator was designed for general use in a wide variety of applications. The series is available in single or two stage models, with low to high flow capacities.  Some AK regulator models offer a tied-diaphragm design. Available options include Hastelloy<SPAN style="FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA">® </SPAN>internals for corrosion resistance, panel installation, and a variety of pressure gauges in psig/bar or MPa units.

breadCrumb.name: AK1500, Single Stage Regulator, Low Flow, General Applications
